```{r}
data(ChickWeight)
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(ChickWeight, aes(x = Time, y = weight, color = Diet)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(se = FALSE)

```

The `ChickWeight`  data records the weights of chicks measured over time under different diets.\
It contains 578 observations of 4 variables: weight, time, chick ID, and diet.\
This dataset is commonly used to study growth patterns and compare the effects of diet on development.
